Bash("C:\\Python313\\python.exe" -c "
from rag_engine import GroveRAG
rag = GroveRAG\(\)
rag.load_model\(\)
rag.load\(\)

queries = [''What is the Trellis Architecture?'', ''Explain the Foundation Loop'', ''How do sprouts work?'']
for q in queries:
    print\(f''\\n=== {q} ===''\)
    results = rag.search\(q, top_k=3\)
    for r in results:
        print\(f''{r.score:.3f} | {r.title[:50]}...''\)
        print\(f''   {r.excerpt[:100]}...''\)
")
